statements: SELECT * FROM drug_compound_data WHERE compound_name = 'Paracetamol';
SELECT compound_id, compound_name, molecular_structure FROM drug_compound_data WHERE molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT compound_id, compound_name, testing_result FROM drug_compound_data ORDER BY compound_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_compound_data WHERE melting_point BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT compound_id, compound_name, testing_result FROM drug_compound_data WHERE testing_result ->> 'outcome' = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM drug_compound_data WHERE compound_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT compound_name, molecular_structure FROM drug_compound_data WHERE molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT compound_name, melting_point FROM drug_compound_data ORDER BY melting_point DESC;
SELECT compound_name, testing_result FROM drug_compound_data WHERE testing_result->>'success' = 'true';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drug_compound_data;
SELECT * FROM drug_compounds;
SELECT compound_name, molecular_weight FROM drug_compounds WHERE compound_id = 1;
SELECT compound_id, compound_name FROM drug_compounds ORDER BY compound_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM testing_results WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_id, compound_id, test_result FROM testing_results WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM drug_compounds;
SELECT compound_id, molecular_structure FROM drug_compounds ORDER BY molecular_weight DESC;
SELECT compound_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM drug_compounds JOIN testing_results ON drug_compounds.compound_id = testing_results.compound_id GROUP BY compound_name;
SELECT compound_name, test_description, test_result FROM drug_compounds JOIN testing_results ON drug_compounds.compound_id = testing_results.compound_id WHERE test_result = 'Positive';

SELECT compound_name, test_description, test_date FROM drug_compounds JOIN testing_results ON drug_compounds.compound_id = testing_results.compound_id WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compound_structures;
SELECT compound_name, structure FROM compound_structures ORDER BY compound_name ASC;
SELECT compound_name, structure, compound_id FROM compound_structures WHERE compound_id = 3;
SELECT compound_name, boiling_point FROM compound_properties WHERE melting_point > 100;
SELECT test_type, test_result, test_date FROM testing_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compound_structures;
SELECT compound_name, structure FROM compound_structures ORDER BY compound_id DESC;
SELECT cp.compound_name, cp.structure, cpp.melting_point, cpp.boiling_point FROM compound_structures cp JOIN compound_properties cpp ON cp.compound_id = cpp.compound_id;
SELECT tr.test_type, tr.test_result, tr.test_date, cp.compound_name FROM testing_results tr JOIN compound_structures cp ON tr.compound_id = cp.compound_id WHERE tr.test_type = 'Lab Test';
SELECT cp.compound_name, cp.structure, cpp.molecular_weight FROM compound_structures cp JOIN compound_properties cpp ON cp.compound_id = cpp.compound_id WHERE cpp.molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM compound_structures;
SELECT compound_id, structure FROM compound_structures WHERE compound_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT molecular_weight, melting_point FROM compound_properties WHERE melting_point > 100;
SELECT test_id, compound_id, result FROM testing_results WHERE test_type = 'toxicity' AND result = TRUE;
SELECT process_id, process_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_processes ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compound_structures ORDER BY compound_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT structure FROM compound_structures WHERE compound_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT molecular_weight, melting_point FROM compound_properties WHERE melting_point > 100 AND molecular_weight < 500 ORDER BY melting_point ASC;
SELECT compound_id, test_type, result FROM testing_results WHERE result = TRUE ORDER BY test_type ASC, test_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_processes WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT compound_name, molecular_weight FROM drug_compound_structures;
SELECT compound_id, compound_name, molecular_formula FROM drug_compound_structures WHERE molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM compound_properties WHERE melting_point < 50;
SELECT test_type, test_date FROM testing_results WHERE test_result = 'positive';
SELECT process_id, process_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_processes;
SELECT compound_name, molecular_formula, molecular_weight FROM drug_compound_structures;
SELECT compound_name, melting_point, boiling_point, density FROM drug_compound_structures JOIN compound_properties ON drug_compound_structures.compound_id = compound_properties.compound_id;
SELECT test_type, test_result, test_date FROM testing_results WHERE test_type = 'Safety Test';
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_processes ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT compound_name, melting_point, density FROM drug_compound_structures JOIN compound_properties ON drug_compound_structures.compound_id = compound_properties.compound_id WHERE melting_point > 100 AND density < 1.0;
